dcterms:description: A multi-class, single-image dataset consisting of images of German road signs in 43 classes, ranging in size from 25 × 25 to 243 × 225, with a total of 39209 training images and 12630 testing images. It includes various types of signs such as prohibitory, danger, and mandatory signs, and is known for its challenges due to perspective changes, shading, and lighting conditions.
dcterms:title: German Traffic Sign Recognition Benchmark (GTSRB)

dcterms:description: The Belgium Traffic Signs test dataset contains 7095 images of 62 classes, with only 23 classes matching those from GTSRB. The dataset was used for testing purposes, and only the training folder images were utilized, totaling 4533 images.
dcterms:title: Belgian Traffic Sign Database

dcterms:description: The Chinese Traffic Signs test dataset contains 5998 images for testing across 58 classes, with only 15 classes matching those from GTSRB. This dataset was used for testing purposes in conjunction with the GTSRB dataset.
dcterms:title: Chinese Traffic Sign Database
